Description: WE ARE FLORIDA'S OLDEST VINTAGE GUITAR SHOP ! 2017 Gibson Les Paul Std. Classic w/that cool flat & wide Neck ! Ultra cool model Les Paul Std. in this really groovy see-thru faded Sea Foam Green finished maple top showing some neat darker stained grain, its Classic 60’s flat/wide mahog neck & back are really beautiful, its stock pickups sounds fabulous, she is mint w/its original black pouch full of candy & tags & comes in its original Brown hard case. We stock over 200 of the best vintage & collectible guitars in the USA as well as some very unusual classic & modern sports cars. Please click the "See Other Items" icon above to see all we have available. We also buy cool guitars & amps every day as well as any unusual cars…weather it’s 1 item or a whole collection.
Title: 2017 Gibson Les Paul Std. "Classic '60" in a cool Sea Foam Green !!
